name: docs-generator
description: Example project that uses MkDocs and Python to create Documentation

scripts.create-site:
npm run download-project && python3 
     scripts/create_site.py && npm run serve-site
scripts.serve-site: cd mkdocs-site && mkdocs build && mkdocs serve
scripts.deploy-site:
cd mkdocs-site && mkdocs build && mkdocs gh-  
     deploy
scripts.setup: npm run install-mkdocs && npm run install-material

author: Andrew Evans
